meanings.sent1: The danker basement made me shiver.
meanings.sent2: The cellar felt danker after the rain.
meanings.sent3: The danker room reminded me of a chilly cave.
meanings.sent4: The danker air clung to my skin like a clammy blanket.
meanings.sent5: The danker atmosphere was like walking through a misty forest.

meanings.sent1: The danker garbage bin needed to be emptied.
meanings.sent2: The alley had a danker odor than usual.
meanings.sent3: The danker scent wafted through the room, making everyone wrinkle their noses.
meanings.sent4: The danker stench hung in the air like a foul cloud.
meanings.sent5: The danker smell was so strong, it lingered long after the source was removed.

meanings.definition: Of a higher quality or intensity, especially in relation to marijuana.
meanings.sent1: The danker strain of weed had a stronger effect.
meanings.sent2: The new batch was definitely danker than the last.
meanings.sent3: His eyes lit up when he smelled the danker aroma of the premium marijuana.
meanings.sent4: The danker weed hit me like a wave of relaxation.
meanings.sent5: The danker quality of the cannabis was evident in its potent scent.
